Title: Pomo
Description: "Pomo" (as in "Pomodoro") is a simple task timer written in WPF and C#.  Its features will be expanded to include logging and audible alarms and its design refactored to implement the MVVM pattern.  Its initial design is inspired by KeepFocused (http://keepfocused.codeplex.com/).
HomeWiki:
Project Description

"Pomo" (as in "Pomodoro") is a simple task timer written in WPF and C#. Its features will be expanded to include logging and audible alarms and its design refactored to implement the MVVM pattern. Its initial design is inspired by KeepFocused (http://keepfocused.codeplex.com/).



More Screenshots and Usage

For more information about The Pomodoro Technique, visit the official website.

Love it? Hate it? I would appreciate any comments, reviews, or other feedback!
